title: Perma Banned for being Toxic
body:
SO this account which I've probably dropped over $1k on has been perma banned. 

I have no problem with 2 week bans, chat restrictions, draft queue forced wins to play ranked again etc. I have a huge ass problem with perma bans for words that someone consented to see. Every single person that downloads League has a client that comes with a language filter activated. There is not one single person who has been offended by my chats that did not consent to seeing those chats. 

So why am I losing an account with every single champion unlocked, 14 rune pages, every single rune unlocked and over 90 skins bought with 520k ip sitting there because of words that people had to actively allow to even see them?
